HfTRUE COPY// P.S. TO JUDGE rs. soleikER62 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. aE Caroma ORDER Petitioners are accused in C.C. No.497/2009 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, North Paravoor, which has arisen from Crime No.804/2006 of the North Paravoor Police Station, registered for the offences punishable under Sections 143, 147, 148, 324, 447 and 506 (ii) read with Section 149 of the Indian Penal Code. 2. The matter has been amicably settled between the petitioners and the defacto complainant, who is the second respondent herein and the other affected parties, who are respondents 2 to 13. They have filed separate affidavits as Annexures A2 to A13 affirming that the matter has been amicably settled between them and the petitioners and they have no complaints against the petitioners. soleikER62 CRL.M.C.No. 7843 of 2015 uoe 3. No criminal antecedents have been reported against the petitioners. When the matter has been amicably setiled, no purpose would be served in proceeding with the matter further, and therefore, all further proceedings in C.C. No.497/2009 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, North Paravoor, as against the petitioners, based on Annexure Ai Final Report in Crime No.804/2006 of the North Paravoor Police Station, can be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and all further proceedings in C.C. No.497/2009 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court-l, North Paravoor, as against the petitioners, based on Annexure A1 Final Report in Crime No.804/2006 of the North Paravoor Police Station, are hereby quashed. Sd/- B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE ul/- [True copy] PS. to Judge
